body:
Add the latest CCache release. Fixes issues with `-x cu` and `-dc` that are not present in the last checksummed release. This fixes workflows with CMake.

https://ccache.dev/releasenotes.html#_ccache_3_7_9
https://github.com/ccache/ccache/pull/381
https://github.com/ccache/ccache/pull/563
https://github.com/ccache/ccache/commit/fbfc0caf87e876afcfd21babe1ccd159a3b2dc21
title: CCache 3.7.9
